description.value:
You have a literal sixth sense for ambient magic in your vicinity.

You can sense the presence of magic auras as though you were always using a 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Detect Magic]{Detect Magic} spell. This detects magic in your field of vision only.

When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Seek]{Seek}, you gain the benefits of a 3rd-level detect magic spell on things you see (in addition to the normal benefits of Seeking). You can turn this sense off and on with a free action at the start or the end of your turn.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast (arcane, divine, natural, or occult).
